Product Description

Curated with Care

Clean and composed lines, modern design, and a strong focus on quality are the foundations Juvale is built on.

Wooden Block Calendar

These cute farmhouse calendar blocks feature dates that can be updated each morning. The interchangeable wooden calendar can be used at home or in businesses. Plus, the rustic date blocks make an excellent gift for teacher appreciation or to help students stay organized.

Dimension: 5W x 4H in

Rustic Calendar Blocks

Our wooden perpetual calendar includes 2 numbered wooden cubes and 3 monthly blocks in a vintage-looking storage container.

Farmhouse Desk Accessories

This office desk calendar can also be displayed on your mantel, living room table, home, bookshelves, dorm room, classroom, or kitchen counter.

Month + Day

Keep track of the date when at home, school, medical practice, restaurant, or boutique counter.

Modern Solutions

Uncomplicate your home with our affordable, stylish, and long-lasting, home décor, kitchen and entertaining accessories.

Thoughtful Design

Each homeware collection combines contemporary aesthetics with the quality and minimalism of European and Scandinavian design.

Size
5W x 4H in 4.5L x 2.5W x 5.8H in 6W x 16H in

Material
Wood Wood Tin

Wooden Perpetual Calendar: This perpetual calendar includes numbered wooden cubes and monthly blocks in a vintage-looking storage container to help you keep track of the date
Great for Any Occasion: The cute decorative calendar blocks are perfect for teacher desk decor, school and classroom shelves, office supplies, medical practices, coffee shops, and restaurants
Easy to Use: The individual day and month date blocks for desk can be easily changed to reflect the current date or holiday
Dimensions: The block calendar for desk set measures 5.3 x 3.7 x 2.6 inches; each numbered cube measures 2.3 x 2.3 inches; each of the 3 month-printed blocks measure 4.7 x 0.8 inches
Comes With: You will receive 2 numbered wooden cubes and 3 monthly blocks in a vintage-style storage container to add to your farmhouse office decor

Product Description

2023-2024 Desk Calendar – 18 Months Large Monthly Desk Calendar, 17″x 12″ , Janaury 2023-June 2023

Advantage of 2023-2024 desk calendar

18 months from Janaury 2023- June 2024 are covered.Premium paper is ink-proof and avoids feathering.Can be used as a desk calendar or a wall calendarPages size: 17″ x 12″.Pages color: 6 fashion elements, very beautiful

Detailed introduction introduction of the 2023-2024 desk calendar page

Julian DatesHolidays ReminderAmple Ruled Writing Blocks 1.8″ x 2″Referencing Calendar for 18 MonthsNotes Section

Rich colors

Reject boring and monotonous, add richer colors to life.

2 Hanging holes

It can be used as a wall calendar or a desk calendar, suitable for living room, classroom, office.

Two corner protectors

2 clear corner protector efficiently reduce dog-eared pages and make the desk calendar pages easily manageable, avoid curling.

High-quality thick paper

Prevent ink seepage and scratch resistance, which will provide you a smooth writing experience. Moreover, the perforated pages of the desk calendar can be used for easy removal.

Improve time management skills

Recording what needs to be done on the desk calendar 2023-2024 can be a good reminder

MONTHLY OVERVIEW – 18 months desk calendar covers from Jan. 2023 – Jun. 2024. Monthly overview in every page (17″ x 12″), can plan a better future life. Julian dates and highlighting help remind you of every important day.
SUFFICIENT LINED BLOCKS – This desk calendar 2023-2024 offers you the large, ruled daily blocks, so the important things can be recorded on this desk calendar to remind you of them. Each month features daily block( 1.8″ x 2″) with Julian dates and holidays.And it also contains the notes section, you can record some extra content.
HIGH QUALITY THICK PAPER -The paper of this 2023-2024 desk calendar is thick enough to resist the damage of light and air. Prevent ink seepage and scratch resistance, which will provide you a smooth writing experience. Moreover, the perforated pages of the desk calendar can be used for easy removal.
EXCELLENT DESIGN – The desk calendar/wall calendar has rich colors and 6 different page designs, rejecting monotony and bringing more fun to life. In addition, two transparent corners can keep the page flat and prevent paper curling, and two hanging holes can also turn the desk calendar into a wall calendar.
MAKES YOUR LIFE EFFECTIVE – You can write down the things you need to deal with in your life in this 2023-2024 calendar to track your daily to-do list to remind you of tasks and promote them to be completed in the near future. It can also be used to mark important holidays and appointments. This desk calendar is a great life assistant.

BooQool

Warranty & Support

Price: $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:05 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Upoy Charging Hub [New Releases]

–Overview:

4 USB-A + 2 USB-C fast charging ports, 5V-8A, 45W charger adapter, compatible with most kinds of electronic gadgets.

–Features:

“Lightweight”, “space saver”, “versatile”, “compact”, “fast charging”, “portable”, “kawaii”.

–Scenarios:

travel, cruise, desk accessories.

desktop cable management.

gifts for men, women, girls, boys.

If you are hesitating which charger you need…

Electronic Gadgets&Apple Accessories

apple chargers for iphone

Charging station for multiple devices apple, usb power strip supports 6 devices at same time!

charger for apple watch

Usb wall charger for apple watch, compatible with usb-a and usb-c charging cord, a single charging adapter does not need to be replaced!

chargers for Ipad

Ipad charging station fast charging, no matter for c port or lightning port, upoy multi usb port charger does the job!

Charger for Airpods

Charging blocks for all kinds of airpods, No need to take off your airpods case, automatically stop while full charging!

Personal charging hub cruise essentials: Charging tower with 4 usb-a and 2 usb-c ports, glossy shell&small footprint; travel accessories for men, women, teens.
Cell phone chargers & power adapters: Charger block total 8A, USB adapter compatible 5W/10W/15W/20W, kawaii desk accessories for Iphone/Samsung.
Universal chargers for multi electronics: Integrated charging accessories for Smart Phone, Tablet, Headphone, Kindle, Oculus, Gaming Controller and more.
Desktop cable management: Charging station 6 ports with 5 ft power cord; Compact, Lightweight, Space saving, Portable, Versatile, USB charging hub for 6 devices simultaneously.
Charging dock with multiple protection: Built-in smart IC against overload, overvoltage, over-temperature, over-charge and short circuits.

Previous page

  2. Upoy is a young and creative brand into electronic gadgets.

    With a group of funny people and a professional supply chain, our vision is to bring world a serie of products with “Unique Style”, “Great Value”, “Reliable Quality”.

    If you also have a restless soul, welcome to join us on the road of exploration.
